name: Ballz (itch) (EdwardKN)
description:
How to play:

The game will choose a ball for you and you can choose time and speed with the arrowkeys. When you're done with that. You can press space  to start. When the time's up you got to pick the ball that was chosen for you and you will get points if you pick the right. If you pick the wrong ball. The game will show the right ball for 5 seconds and you can start over.

Your goal:

Your goal is to follow a ball for a certain amount of time and at a certain speed. The higher speed you choose and the higher amount of time you choose will be but together to be points if you win.

Known bugs:

1. Sometimes theres no ball that gets chosen and sometimes theres two. How to fix: press R until it works:
